ovdesc.p: This application is used to set up the parameters required to print the customer risk collateral report.

This file contains information like risk codes, risk exposure percentages, narratives, collateral codes, narratives & percentages, posting restrict for collateral accounts and forex limit product code. The order in which the risk codes and collateral codes are input in this file decides the order in which the codes will be printed in the reports.
This file should contain only one record with record id as "SYSTEM".

4 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. (Mandatory input.) Multi value field associated with COLLAT.PRCNTG to COLLAT.NARR.

Should either be a valid collateral code defined in LIMIT COLLATERAL file or should be one of the following codes: a) CLIL - Indicates Collateral accounts associated with limits. b) CLNL - Collateral accounts that do not have any corresponding limit reference. c) CRIL - Accounts with positive balances But are not collateral and associated with limits. d) CRNL - Accounts with positive balances which are not collateral and do not have any limit links. Note: Limit product codes 9700, 9800 & 9900 are also considered as valid collateral codes. But in order to distinguish from collateral codes of the same values, these codes should be entered as 97LL, 98LL or 99LL respectively.
